body_html: The problem is (or seems to be) that the variable+initializer get assigned to GPU when the initializer runs, but the training op is CPU-only, leading to this error. Your upcoming placer changes should fix this, so hopefully it'll be no extra work! :)

body: The problem is (or seems to be) that the variable+initializer get assigned to GPU when the initializer runs, but the training op is CPU-only, leading to this error. Your upcoming placer changes should fix this, so hopefully it'll be no extra work! :)
